xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 24 June 2013
xwikidoc.content: <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 08:23 <bvancea> has joined #ccm 09:04 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 11:13 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 12:01 <sdumitriu> Hey Ravi 12:02 <ravigarg27> Hi sdumitriu 12:02 <ravigarg27> How are you? 12:03 <sdumitriu> Good 12:03 <sdumitriu> You? 12:03 <ravigarg27> umm happy to arrive safely 12:03 <ravigarg27> was trapped in floods in North India 12:10 <ravigarg27> anyways, I will work on cTAKES integration to Phenotips this week 12:10 <ravigarg27> can you please guide me on How to start 12:14 <ravigarg27_> has joined #ccm 12:17 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 12:18 <sdumitriu> Well, you alredy started 12:18 <sdumitriu> What's blocking you? 12:20 <ravigarg27_> integration I didn't 12:21 <ravigarg27_> I have to make it maven dependency right? 12:22 <sdumitriu> Yes 12:22 <ravigarg27_> so can you just give me the pathway on how to proceed with it 12:28 <sdumitriu> So, you have to decide which components you want to use 12:28 <sdumitriu> The list is here: https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/CTAKES/cTAKES+3.0+Component+Use+Guide 12:28 <sdumitriu> You can start with the Core 12:29 <sdumitriu> You can go to http://search.maven.org/ , which searches in the central maven repository 12:29 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 12:29 <sdumitriu> ravigarg27: Did you get that? 12:29 <ravigarg27> yeah I am reading the logs 12:29 <sdumitriu> Good 12:30 <sdumitriu> You can search for "ctakes core" 12:30 <ravigarg27> sorry for the disruptions 12:30 <ravigarg27> ok 12:30 <sdumitriu> Click on the version 12:30 <sdumitriu> It should lead to this: http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|org.apache.ctakes|ctakes-core|3.0.0-incubating|jar 12:31 <sdumitriu> And it gives the exact code to use in the pom to declare a dependency, in the "Dependency Information -> Apache Maven" section 12:33 <ravigarg27> okay and do that for every component 12:36 <ravigarg27> so I will include all the necessary components for now 13:06 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 22:11 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm
